Package org.holoeverywhere.addon

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AddonTabber.AddonTabberCallback  
    IAddonAttacher<V extends IAddonBase<?>>
    Interface for interaction with objects which can handle addons
    IAddonThemes.ThemeResolver  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddonTabber  
    AddonTabber.AddonTabberA  
    AddonTabber.AddonTabberF  
    IAddon
    Basic class-holder of addons
    This class implement a storage for all type-specified addons, like IAddonActivity and IAddonFragment
    IAddonActivity
    Basic addon class which can handle some activity events, like changing content or dispatching keyevents
    IAddonApplication
    Basic addon class which can handle application create event
    IAddonAttacher.AddonCallback<V>  
    IAddonBase<T>
    Basic type-specified addon holder
    IAddonBasicAttacher<V extends IAddonBase<Z>,Z>  
    IAddonFragment
    Basic addon class which can handle creating of fragment and it's view
    IAddonThemes
    Helper for handling custom themes for required parts of library, like view themes in preferences addon
